titles: An elegie on the death of Mrs. Rebecca Palmer. Daughter of A.P.M. who died in the fifteenth year of her age, November 17. 1667.
notes: Verse: "HEre lies the Cask, the Jewel it self is gone ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Palmer, Rebecca, d. 1667 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
